item.title: HP Mini 5102
item.description: The HP Mini 5102, announced at CES 2010, is a netbook targeted at business and education use.

item.title: HP Mini 2102
item.description: The HP Mini 2102, which was announced at CES 2010, is one of 1st HP netbooks equipped with a processor based on Intel's Pine Trail platform.

item.title: HP 2133 Mini-Note KX869AT
item.description: The HP 2133 Mini-Note is a full-function personal computer equipped with a 1.2GHz VIA C7-M ULV (ultra-low voltage) processor and 1024 MB RAM.

item.title: MSI Wind
item.description: Micro-Star International's (MSI) Wind netbook was first announced at CeBIT 2008.

item.title: HP 2133 Mini-Note KX870AT
item.description: The HP 2133 Mini-Note is a full-function personal computer equipped with a VIA C7-M ULV processor that offers ultimate mobility.
